Hi! I'm Richard.



I have a solid foundation in programming across multiple languages, including C++, Python, HTML/CSS, and JavaScript, as well as interpretive languages such as Markdown and LaTeX. I participated in FRC robotics training and led the mechanical design of five robots.

Aficionado of linguistics, politics, and history, I have conducted research projects on extinct East Asian languages, performed public policy analyses on East Asian geopolitics, and developed a history-oriented oral interview series. One research paper focusing on nationalism was published.

An active student leader, I have secured internships in high school admissions, outreach, and interviewing. I also conducted data research focused on predicting stock movements and gained insights in real-world stock trading.

As an avid athlete, I am a professional golf player who competes in state-level competitions. Additionally, I have extensive experience in badminton, table tennis, squash, and soccer.
